data.title: Doctor Doom Kills The Marvel Universe In October's Variant Covers
data.meta_description: Doctor Doom kills -- or badly hurts -- your favorite Marvel heroes in a series of Variant Covers to be released this October.
data.text:
No surprise here, but Marvel is all in on Doctor Doom. The villain is Marvel Comics’s new Sorcerer Supreme after the end of Blood Hunt. And starting in 2025, they’ll be kicking off “One World Under Doom,” a mysterious new event. Also, there’s that whole “Robert Downey Jr. as Doom” thing. And now, he’s straight up murdering your favorite heroes in a series of variant covers.

Per Marvel, there are 21 total variant covers rolling out weekly from the publisher — 11 of which have been revealed below. They include Doom beating the Avengers, chopping up Deadpool, strangling Miles Morales, and the less asked about what’s going on with Spider-Gwen the better.

You can check them all out below, including the full list of variants coming in October. And click for larger versions.

On Sale 10/2

DAREDEVIL #14 DOOM VARIANT COVER BY CHAD HARDIN – 75960620531801421

DEADPOOL #7 DOOM VARIANT COVER BY AMANDA CONNER – 75960620897500721

IMMORTAL THOR #16 DOOM VARIANT COVER BY ANDREI BRESSAN – 75960620664301621

SPIDER-GWEN: THE GHOST-SPIDER #6 DOOM VARIANT COVER BY GLEB MELNIKOV – 75960620908800621

STORM #1 DOOM VARIANT COVER BY MARCO CHECCHETTO – 75960621036700141

X-MEN #5 DOOM VARIANT COVER BY ALESSANDRO CAPPUCCIO – 75960620920000531
